mod.description: This mod improves how AI empires expand in the Space Stage. Instead of random or unrealistic expansion, empires now prioritize colonizing nearby star systems, especially those with habitable planets and valuable spice. As the empire grows, it focuses on filling in gaps near existing colonies. Within each star system, the AI always chooses the best available planet for colonization based on habitability and spice value.
